rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area aligned with Vastu principles ensuring clear energy flow and a central courtyard view.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room with decorative tiles, vibrant textiles, and ample seating arrangements for social gatherings. Windows face the central courtyard to ensure natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchen designed with traditional Indian elements and modern touches; includes storage and a prep area integrated into an open space.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater in a corner of the living room extension, with sound insulation and minimalistic design to blend with the bohemian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Bohemian guest bedroom that doubles as an office or study. The design ensures privacy while maintaining open flow towards the courtyard.
